WarehouseID.description: The unique identifier for the warehouse

ItemNumber.description: The unique identifier for the item

PhysicalStock.description: The physical stock of the item

PhysicalAvailability.description: The physical availability of the item

PhysicalBooked.description: The physical booked quantity of the item

AvailableTotal.description: The total available quantity of the item

ResearchName.description: The research name of the item

Site.description: The site where the item is located

TotalOrdered.description: The total quantity ordered for the item

OnDelivery.description: The quantity of the item on delivery

OrderedBooked.description: The quantity of the item ordered and booked

NetWeight.description: The net weight of the item
